title: Here begynneth a lytell boke, that speketh of purgatorye [et] what purgatorye is [et] in what place, and of the paynes that be therin, and whiche soules do abyde therin tyll they be pourged of synne, and whiche abyde not there. ...
author: Rolle, Richard, of Hampole, 1290?-1349, attributed name.
publisher: Imprynted by me Robert wyer, dwellynge at the sygne of saynt Iohan Euangelyste, in saynt Martyns parysshe in the felde, in the byshop of Norwytche rentes, besyde Charynge Crosse,
